targets.query: SELECT last("items") FROM "autogen"."libraries" WHERE ("lib_name" = 'Movies')
SELECT last("items") FROM "libraries" WHERE ("host" = '10.0.10.175' AND "lib_name" = 'TV Shows')
SELECT last("seasons") FROM "libraries" WHERE ("host" = '10.0.10.175' AND "lib_name" = 'TV Shows')
SELECT last("episodes") FROM "libraries" WHERE ("host" = '10.0.10.175' AND "lib_name" = 'TV Shows')

SELECT last("user") AS "User", "player" AS "Client", "media_type" AS "Media Type", "title" AS "Title", "grandparent_title" AS "Series", "parent_title" AS "Season",  "year" AS "Year",  "resolution" AS "V.Quality", "container" AS "V.Container", "video_codec" as "V.Codec", "video_framerate" as "V.Framerate", "audio_codec" AS "A.Codec", "transcode_summary" AS "Transcode", "length_ms" AS "Duration", "position_ms" as "Position", "pos_percent"  AS "Playback %",  "status" AS "Status" FROM "now_playing" WHERE time > now() - 10s GROUP BY "session_id"
SELECT 100 - (last("free") /  last("total")) * 100 AS "% used" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = 'shockwave' AND "device" = '192.168.1.127:/') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "device" fill(null)
SELECT last("osd_bytes_used")  /  last("osd_bytes") * 100 FROM "ceph" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT last("free") AS "free" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = 'shockwave' AND "device" = '192.168.1.127:/') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "device" fill(null)
SELECT 100 - (last("free") /  last("total")) * 100 AS "% used" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = 'shockwave' AND "device" = '192.168.1.127:/') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "device" fill(null)
SELECT last("free") AS "free" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = 'shockwave' AND "device" = '192.168.1.127:/') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "device" fill(null)
SELECT mean("load1") FROM "system" WHERE "host" = 'shockwave' GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
SELECT last("load15") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/

SELECT last("pct_pct_system") + last("pct_pct_user") + last("pct_pct_iowait") + last("pct_pct_nice") + last("pct_pct_steal") as "utilized" FROM "cpu_util" WHERE ("host" = 'shockwave') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("total") - last("free") AS "Used" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = 'shockwave' AND "device" = '192.168.1.127:/') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("total") - last("free") AS "Used" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = 'shockwave' AND "device" = '192.168.1.127:/') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("free") AS "free" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = 'shockwave' AND "device" = '192.168.1.127:/') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "device" fill(null)
SELECT last("free") AS "free" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = 'shockwave' AND "device" = '192.168.1.127:/') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "device" fill(null)

SELECT last("load1") AS "load1", last("load5") AS "load5", last("load15") AS "load15", last(n_cpus) AS "cpu count" FROM "system" WHERE ("host" = 'shockwave') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("rxkB_per_s") * 8 AS "in", mean("txkB_per_s") * 8 AS "out" FROM "network" WHERE ("host" = 'shockwave') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("pct_pct_steal") AS "steal", last("pct_pct_nice") AS "nice", last("pct_pct_iowait") AS "iowait", last("pct_pct_system") AS "system", last("pct_pct_user") AS "user", 100 - last("pct_pct_idle") AS "total" FROM "cpu_util" WHERE ("host" = 'shockwave') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT 100 - last("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = 'shockwave') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s), "cpu" fill(null)
SELECT mean("rwB_per_s") AS "read", mean("wkB_per_s") AS "write" FROM "disk" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "device" fill(null)
SELECT mean("rwB_per_s") AS "read", mean("wkB_per_s") AS "write" FROM "disk" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "device" fill(null)
SELECT mean("rkB_per_s") AS "read", mean("wkB_per_s") AS "write" FROM "disk" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "device" fill(null)
SELECT mean("rkB_per_s") AS "read", mean("wkB_per_s") AS "write" FROM "disk" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "device" fill(null)

SELECT derivative(last("read_bytes"), 1s) AS "read", derivative(last("write_bytes"), 1s) AS "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$ceph$/ AND "name" =~ /^[s|v|m]d([0-9]|[a-z]+)$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name", time($__interval)

SELECT derivative(sum("write_bytes"), 1s) as "total write", derivative(sum("read_bytes"), 1s) as "total read" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$ceph$/ AND "name" =~ /^[s|v|m]d([0-9]|[a-z]+)$/)  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT derivative(last("writes"), 1s) AS "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "name" =~ /^[s|d|v][d][a-z|0-9]$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name" fill(null)
